page.description: Specify a comma delimited list of .aex files. These files contain compiled Xbasic functions that can be used in any of the server-side event handlers.

section.note: You do not have to list .aex files here if you have specified the .aex files in the Project Properties dialog. Concerning the 'Aex files property', if you specify .aex files here they will be automatically added to the 'Aex files' property in the Project Properties. The Project Properties dialog is opened from the toolbar of the Web Projects Control Panel.
